title: PASS ME NOT O! GENTLE SAVIOUR

sections.title: Chorus
content: Saviour, Saviour, hear my humble cry:
And while others on Thou art calling

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Pass me not O gentle Saviour
While on others Thou art calling,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Let me at a throne of mercy

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Thou the spring of all my comfort,
Whom have I on earth beside Thee?
